verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Having Risen Up <S%G450><s%> All <S%G537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Led <S%G71><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate. <S%G4091><s%>

<S%G756><s%> And They Began <S%G1161><s%> To Accuse <S%G2723><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> This Man <S%G5126><s%> We Found <S%G2147><s%> Perverting <S%G1294><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nation, <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Forbidding <S%G2967><s%> To Caesar <S%G2541><s%> Tribute <S%G5411><s%> To Give, <S%G1325><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> A King <S%G935><s%> Is. <S%G1511><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Questioned <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G5346><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Sayest. <S%G3004><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds, <S%G3793><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Find I 2147 V-PAI-1S Blamable 158 A-ASN In 1722 PREP 3588 T-DSM 444 N-DSM This Man. 5129 D-DSM

<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Were Insisting, <S%G2001><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> He Stirs Up <S%G383><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> ' Throughout <S%G2596><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> Beginning <S%G756><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%> Even To <S%G2193><s%> Here. <S%G5602><s%>

<S%G4091><s%> But Pilate <S%G1161><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Galilee Named <S%G1056><s%> Asked <S%G1905><s%> Whether <S%G1487><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> A Galilean <S%G1057><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Known <S%G1921><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Jurisdiction <S%G1849><s%> Of Herod <S%G2264><s%> He Is, <S%G2076><s%> He Sent Up <S%G375><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> Greatly, <S%G3029><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For He Was <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2309><s%> Wishing <S%G1537><s%> For Long <S%G2425><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Because Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hearing <S%G191><s%> Many Things <S%G4183><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Was Hoping <S%G1679><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> To See <S%G1492><s%> ' By <S%G5259><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Done. <S%G1096><s%>

<S%G1905><s%> And He Questioned <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Words <S%G3056><s%> Many, <S%G2425><s%> <S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2476><s%> And Had Stood <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes; <S%G1122><s%> Violently <S%G2159><s%> Accusing <S%G2723><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1848><s%> And Having Set At Nought <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Troops <S%G4753><s%> His, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Mocked Him, <S%G1702><s%> Having Put On <S%G4016><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Apparel <S%G2066><s%> Splendid <S%G2986><s%> He Sent Back <S%G375><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Pilate. <S%G4091><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And Became <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5384><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Friends <S%G5037><s%> Both Pilate <S%G4091><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> That Same <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> One Another; <S%G240><s%> <S%G4391><s%> For Before They Were <S%G1063><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2189><s%> Enmity <S%G5607><s%> Between <S%G4314><s%> Themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G4091><s%> And Pilate <S%G1161><s%> Having Called Together <S%G4779><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rulers <S%G758><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%>

Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Ye Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G444><s%> This Man, <S%G5126><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Turning Away <S%G654><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Before 1799 ADV You 5216 P-2GP Having Examined Him 350 V-AAP-NSM Nothing 3762 A-ASN Found 2147 V-2AAI-1S In 1722 PREP 3588 T-DSM 444 N-DSM This Man 5129 D-DSM Blamable As To The Things 158 A-ASN Of Which 3739 R-GPN Ye Bring Accusation 2723 V-PAI-2P ' Against 2596 PREP Him; 846 P-GSM

' <S%G235><s%> Nor Even <S%G3761><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> <S%G375><s%> For I Sent Up <S%G1063><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Done <S%G4238><s%> By Him. <S%G846><s%>
Having Chastised <S%G3811><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> I Will Release Him. <S%G630><s%>
Necessity <S%G318><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> He Had <S%G2192><s%> To Release <S%G630><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> At The <S%G2596><s%> Feast <S%G1859><s%> One. <S%G1520><s%>

They Cried Out <S%G349><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> In A Mass, <S%G3826><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Away With <S%G142><s%> This Man, <S%G5126><s%> Release <S%G630><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Barabbas; <S%G912><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Insurrection <S%G4714><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> Made <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Murder <S%G5408><s%> Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Prison. <S%G5438><s%>
Again <S%G3825><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Called To Them, <S%G4377><s%> Wishing <S%G2309><s%> To Release <S%G630><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Were Crying Out, <S%G2019><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>, Crucify, <S%G4717><s%> Crucify <S%G4717><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> A Third Time <S%G5154><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G1063><s%> Evil <S%G2556><s%> Did Commit <S%G4160><s%> This Man? <S%G3778><s%> No <S%G3762><s%> Cause <S%G158><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> Found I 2147 V-2AAI-1S In 1722 PREP Him. 846 P-DSM Having Chastised 3811 V-AAP-NSM Therefore 3767 CONJ Him 846 P-ASM I Will Release Him. 630 V-FAI-1S

<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Were Urgent <S%G1945><s%> With Voices <S%G5456><s%> Loud, <S%G3173><s%> Asking For <S%G154><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Be Crucified. <S%G4717><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Prevailed <S%G2729><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Voices <S%G5456><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests. <S%G749><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> Adjudged <S%G1948><s%> To Be Done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G155><s%> Their Request. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G630><s%> And He Released <S%G1161><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Insurrection <S%G4714><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Murder <S%G5408><s%> Had Been Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> They Asked For; <S%G154><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> He Delivered Up <S%G3860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> To Their Will. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> They Led Away <S%G520><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Having Laid Hold On <S%G1949><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> A Certain <S%G5100><s%> A Cyrenian <S%G2956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> A Field, <S%G68><s%> They Put Upon <S%G2007><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross <S%G4716><s%> To Bear It <S%G5342><s%> Behind <S%G3693><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Were Following <S%G190><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Great <S%G4183><s%> Multitude <S%G4128><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of Women, <S%G1135><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Were Bewailing <S%G2875><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lamenting <S%G2354><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4762><s%> And Turning <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Daughters <S%G2364><s%> <S%G2419><s%> Of Jerusalem, <S%G3361><s%> Weep Not <S%G2799><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%> Me, <S%G1691><s%> But <S%G4133><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%> Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> Weep <S%G2799><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Your Children : <S%G5216><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Are Coming <S%G2064><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Will Say, <S%G2046><s%> Blessed Are <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Barren <S%G4723><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wombs <S%G2836><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Bear <S%G1080><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Breasts <S%G3149><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Gave Not Suck. <S%G2337><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Shall They Begin <S%G756><s%> To Say <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Mountains, <S%G3735><s%> Fall <S%G4098><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Us; <S%G2248><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Hills, <S%G1015><s%> Cover <S%G2572><s%> Us : <S%G2248><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Green <S%G5200><s%> Tree <S%G3586><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> They Do, <S%G4160><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dry <S%G3584><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> May Take Place? <S%G1096><s%>
Were Led <S%G71><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Malefactors <S%G2557><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> To Be Put To Death. <S%G337><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> They Came <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> A Skull <S%G2898><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> They Crucified <S%G4717><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2557><s%> Malefactors, <S%G3739><s%> The One <S%G3303><s%> On The <S%G1537><s%> <S%G1188><s%> Right <S%G3739><s%> And One <S%G1161><s%> On The <S%G1537><s%> Left. <S%G710><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Forgive <S%G863><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For They Know Not <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> They Do. <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1266><s%> And Dividing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> His Garments <S%G846><s%> They Cast <S%G906><s%> A Lot. <S%G2819><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Stood <S%G2476><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> Beholding, <S%G2334><s%> <S%G1592><s%> And Were Deriding <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rulers <S%G758><s%> With <S%G4862><s%>, Them, <S%G846><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Others <S%G243><s%> He Saved, <S%G4982><s%> Let Him Save <S%G4982><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Chosen. <S%G1588><s%>

<S%G1702><s%> And Mocked <S%G1161><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> Coming Near <S%G4334><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Vinegar <S%G3690><s%> Offering <S%G4374><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Save <S%G4982><s%> Thyself. <S%G4572><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> And There Was <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> An Inscription <S%G1923><s%> Written <S%G1125><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In Letters <S%G1121><s%>, Greek <S%G1673><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Latin <S%G4513><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Hebrew : <S%G1444><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews. <S%G2453><s%>

<S%G1520><s%> Now One <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Who Had Been Hanged <S%G2910><s%> Malefactors <S%G2557><s%> Railed At <S%G987><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Save <S%G4982><s%> Thyself <S%G4572><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answering <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Rebuked <S%G2008><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Not Even <S%G3761><s%> Dost Fear <S%G5399><s%> Thou <S%G4771><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, Thou <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Under <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Judgment <S%G2917><s%> Art? <S%G1488><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Justly; <S%G1346><s%> <S%G514><s%> For A Due Recompense <S%G1063><s%> Of What <S%G3739><s%> We Did <S%G4238><s%> We Receive; <S%G618><s%> <S%G3778><s%> But This Man <S%G1161><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> Amiss <S%G824><s%> Did. <S%G4238><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Remember <S%G3415><s%> Me, <S%G3450><s%>, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Thou Comest <S%G2064><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> Thy Kingdom. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Verily <S%G281><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Today <S%G4594><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Thou Shalt Be <S%G2071><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Paradise. <S%G3857><s%>
